Title: Horticulous Slimux
Legend: As Nurgle’s head horticulturist, Slimux has the power to seed his master’s Garden in reality. Surrounded by packs of Beasts of Nurgle and wielding his lethal lopping shears, he is a being to be rightly feared.
Intro: Horticulous Slimux is armed with Lopping Shears.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Rancid Retinue

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s mount, Mulch, is armed with Slime-encrusted Jaws.

Rules.Name: Acidic Slime Trail
Rules.Fluff: Mulch, the daemon beast ridden by Horticulous, secretes a trail of corrosive slime that spells doom for anyone foolish enough to step on it.
Rules.Rule: Before this unit retreats, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 3" of this unit. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Beast Handler
Rules.Fluff: Horticulous is accompanied by romping packs of Beasts of Nurgle, whose foolishness he always forgives, and who look to him like hounds do their master.
Rules.Rule: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly BEASTS OF NURGLE units that are wholly within 14" of this unit. In addition, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly BEASTS OF NURGLE units that are wholly within 14" of this unit.

Rules.Name: Cultivating The Garden Of Nurgle
Rules.Fluff: Wherever Horticulous slimes around in the Mortal Realms, daemonic foliage pokes through the cracks in reality and swiftly takes root.
Rules.Rule: Cultivating the Garden of Nurgle: Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, you can set up 1 Feculent Gnarlmaw within 7" of this unit, more than 7" from all other Feculent Gnarlmaws and more than 3" from all other models, objectives, other terrain features, endless spells and invocations and add it to your army.
